Articles.Content:
When i'm doing some contracts, i spend a little time twisting until i find the marker in the navball. Is there any option to show all the markers in the navball even if they're not inside it's range? Something like Enhanced Navball, but this mod doesn't work to me, so maybe it's implemented in the game settings?

I leave the topic for better understanding.

From
There is no single stock solution, but if you make a maneuver node, a little arrow will point in its direction when it is off the side of the nav ball.
